en: He danced until he faked me.
In the field, the corn is germinating.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n te tsẅe ḿpfɛ́ɛ mmó yɛ̂ wɔ́.
en: I'm not used to eating this thing.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n tsẅe ńzsé mámbàŋa wɛ̂ táʼ n daa júʼ pɛ́ʼɛ̀ na ye wɔ́.
en: I usually know this man but have never heard this about him.

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ lɔɔn ne ńgaba, ɔ̀ tsẅe yé.
en: The moment you share, you reserve his share.
He spoke to the point of crossing the line.
